title: Brown Snakes On A Plane
itunes:title: Brown Snakes On A Plane
description:
TUE 7/26 - Charlamagne confesses to joining the "Bile High Club" on a recent flight to L.A., which spawned the question, "Is it disrespectful to poop on a plane?" Meanwhile, NFL player Aldon Smith may have ish'd on himself in a recent Periscope incident. Candidate for HEE-HAW of the Year!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
